channel.title: Practice2 on Dick Johnson
channel.description: Recent content in Practice2 on Dick Johnson

item.title: Practice2 1.01 Released for iOS
item.description: Practice2 release for iPhone & iPad What’s new Added auto reset if session has ended and start is pressed. Add short app intro. Fixed a few bugs. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.01 Released for macOS
item.description: Practice2 release for macOS What’s new Added auto reset if session has ended and start is pressed. Add short app intro. Fixed a few bugs. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.0 Released for iOS
item.description: Practice2 release for iPhone & iPad A simple practice session timer. For example, use it for guitar practice or a health workout session. Create sessions for different purposes and different durations. Share sessions across devices. Share sessions with friends. All the best, Dick.

item.title: Practice2 1.0 Released for macOS
item.description: Practice2 release for macOS A simple practice session timer. For example, use it for guitar practice or a health workout session. Create sessions for different purposes and different durations. Share sessions across devices. Share sessions with friends. All the best, Dick.
